title: Lunchbox Gave Amy’s Husband A ‘Warning’ + Thieves Using Bluetooth To See What’s Inside Your Car + Bobby’s Mailbag: Mother Worried About Daughter’s New Friend
itunes:title: Lunchbox Gave Amy’s Husband A ‘Warning’ + Thieves Using Bluetooth To See What’s Inside Your Car + Bobby’s Mailbag: Mother Worried About Daughter’s New Friend
description:
There’s an update in the house wars where Lunchbox pulled Amy’s husband aside to give him a warning to back off. Bobby shares a story about how thieves are using Bluetooth to see what’s inside your car…and we all share stories about how we were scammed. Bobby opens a mailbag seeking parenting advice about a mother worried about her daughter’s new friend.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
